exception.name: ErrorTimeNotSet
exception.description: This exception is thrown if an appropriate SE API function is invoked although the managed data/time in the Secure Element has not been updated after the initialization of the SE API or a period of absence of current for the Secure Element.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorTimeNotSet that is thrown if an appropriate SE API function is invoked although the managed data/time in the Secure Element has not been updated after the initialization of the SE API or a period of absence of current for the Secure Element.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when time-dependent operations are invoked without time being set
specification.applicability: All operations requiring valid time in Secure Element
